data.feedback: Architecture is well-designed following Ionic React best practices. Dependencies correctly identified (epic-frontend-foundation creates src/App.tsx). Stories have clear acceptance criteria and proper ordering. Minor type naming differences are non-blocking.

issues.description: Story 6 missing 'bidirectional' status for SharingRelationship type
issues.recommendation: Add 'bidirectional' to status union type to match backend

issues.description: Minor naming differences between frontend types and backend models
issues.recommendation: Consider using backend field names (title vs name, creatorId vs ownerId)

suggestions: Add Step source type 'web' to match backend ('native' | 'manual' | 'web')
Include GroupGoalMembership type for complete goal member tracking
